payload.title: Implement roci-agent aligned to pi-mono agent runtime
Implement MCP stdio transport (spawn process, JSON-RPC over stdin/stdout)
Implement MCP SSE transport (HTTP SSE client for remote servers)
Implement MCPToolAdapter bridge (MCP tools â†’ roci Tool trait)
Implement RealtimeSession::connect() WebSocket to OpenAI realtime API
Add unit tests for auth providers (ClaudeCode, GitHubCopilot, OpenAICodex)
Add unit tests for stream_transform (filter, map, buffer, throttle)
Add unit tests for config (RociConfig::from_env, AuthValue::resolve)
Add unit tests for error (category, is_retryable, recovery_suggestion)
Add unit tests for util (RetryPolicy, ResponseCache, UsageTracker)
Define AgentMessage enum wrapping ModelMessage + custom variants with convertToLlm
Define AgentEvent enum (agent_start/end, turn_start/end, message_start/update/end, tool_execution_start/update/end)
Define AgentTool trait extending Tool with label, streaming on_update callback, and AbortSignal
Implement agent loop core: outer loop (follow-ups) + inner loop (tool calls + steering)
Implement steering messages: check between tool executions, skip remaining, inject before next LLM call
Implement follow-up messages: check after natural loop end, restart if queued
Implement transformContext hook: async pre-LLM message transformation
Implement tool argument validation against JSON schema before execution
Implement observable agent state with event subscription (subscribe/listener pattern)
Implement dynamic API key resolution (per-request async getApiKey callback)
Thread session ID through to provider requests for prompt caching
Add roci-agent feature flag and wire into Cargo.toml
Write comprehensive tests for agent loop (steering, follow-ups, tool execution, events)
Write example: roci-agent with tools showing steering + follow-up patterns
Implement MCP streamable HTTP/SSE transport via rmcp
Implement MCPClient initialize + list_tools + call_tool via rmcp client

payload.description: Replace stdio transport stub with rmcp child-process transport wrapper. Include process lifecycle, cancellation, timeouts, clean shutdown, and error mapping into RociError. Add integration tests against a fixture MCP server process.

Implement remote MCP transport using rmcp streamable HTTP client (including SSE event flow where required by server). Support headers/auth, request timeout/retry controls, and transport close semantics. Add integration tests with a mock MCP HTTP server.

Implement MCPClient methods: initialize handshake/capability negotiation, tools/list retrieval, tools/call execution. Ensure robust protocol validation, structured error mapping, and cancellation behavior. Cover malformed payloads and timeout paths with tests.

Implement MCPToolAdapter bridging MCP-discovered tools into Roci DynamicToolProvider. Map MCP input schema to DynamicTool schema, execute tools with ToolArguments + ToolExecutionContext metadata, and preserve error/result semantics. Add e2e adapter tests.

Implement RealtimeSession::connect using OpenAI Realtime WebSocket API with auth headers, session initialization, event parsing, heartbeat/keepalive, reconnect strategy, and graceful close behavior. Add integration tests with mock WebSocket server.

Add concrete OpenAI Whisper transcription provider implementing AudioProvider. Support multipart upload, language hints, MIME/content validation, timeout/retry handling, and robust error mapping. Add unit/integration tests using wiremock.

Add concrete OpenAI text-to-speech provider implementing SpeechProvider. Support format/voice/speed options, binary audio response handling, timeout/retry behavior, and structured provider errors. Add unit/integration tests.

Implement AuthManager file persistence for credentials.json: load/save APIs, schema validation, atomic writes, secure file permissions, and corruption recovery behavior. Add tests for round-trip and failure paths.
Add comprehensive tests for ClaudeCodeAuth, GitHubCopilotAuth, and OpenAiCodexAuth including success flows, token refresh behavior, pending/slowdown/denied states, and error mapping.
Add full unit test matrix for stream transforms (filter/map/buffer/throttle): correctness, ordering, flush semantics, and error propagation.
Add tests for configuration/auth value resolution: RociConfig::from_env mapping precedence and AuthValue::resolve behavior for ApiKey/BearerToken/EnvVar with failure paths.
Add tests for error classification helpers (category, retryability, recovery suggestions), ensuring stable mappings across major RociError variants.
Add deep tests for utility modules RetryPolicy, ResponseCache, and UsageTracker covering correctness, time-dependent behavior, and concurrency edges.
Integrate rmcp child-process transport and replace stdio stub plumbing in MCP transport layer.
payload.title: Wire rmcp child-process transport wrapper

payload.description: Handle process lifecycle, cancellation, graceful shutdown, and deterministic error mapping for stdio transport.
payload.title: Implement stdio lifecycle/cancel/close semantics

payload.description: Add fixture-based integration tests for happy path, unexpected process exit, and timeout/cancel behavior.
payload.title: Add stdio integration tests

payload.description: Support custom headers/auth and configurable timeout/retry/backoff settings in remote transport.
payload.title: Add auth headers + timeout/retry controls

payload.description: Validate happy path, timeout, and malformed response handling with mock MCP HTTP server.

payload.description: Implement initialize flow with capability negotiation and protocol validation.

payload.description: Validate connect/init, auth failure, and disconnect/reconnect paths against mock websocket server.

payload.description: Cover device-code pending/slowdown/authorized/denied flows plus copilot token exchange and failures.

payload.title: Add RetryPolicy tests

payload.description: Test token/cost accumulation logic and reset/reporting behavior.

payload.description: Add stress tests for concurrent access and time-sensitive behavior across util components.

payload.description: Hardening epic to close all known stub/partial implementations across MCP, audio, config, and test coverage modules using official rmcp integration and deep validation/testing.

payload.title: Define Agent runtime state + API surface
Implement rmcp-based MCP transport layer (stdio + sse)

payload.text: Added github_copilot_auth_tests: device flow pending/slow_down/denied/authorized/expired, poll errors, exchange not-logged-in/401/500, cache-hit + near-expiry refresh, invalid expires_at.
Added claude_code_auth_tests: import missing/oauth-null/success/profile-isolation/invalid-json plus logged_in/get_token coverage.
Added shared tests/auth_support fixture (in-memory TokenStore/token helper) and malformed/partial response regressions across provider tests.
Added openai_codex_auth_tests: device start pending/authorized/exchange-failure/expired, import auth.json variants, refresh success + invalid grant + missing refresh token.
Implemented auth provider expansion via new tests/auth_support + claude_code_auth_tests + github_copilot_auth_tests + openai_codex_auth_tests; all focused tests pass (31/31).
Final focused run: cargo test --test claude_code_auth_tests --test github_copilot_auth_tests --test openai_codex_auth_tests => 33 passed, 0 failed.
Implemented OpenAiWhisperTranscriptionProvider with MIME/content validation, manual multipart upload, timeout+retry, error mapping; added wiremock tests in tests/audio_openai_provider_tests.rs.
Implemented OpenAiTtsProvider with voice/format/speed mapping, response MIME/empty-body checks, timeout+retry, structured provider error mapping; added wiremock tests.

Implemented realtime websocket connect/auth/bootstrap parsing with heartbeat, reconnect/backoff, graceful close; added mock websocket integration tests in tests/realtime_session_tests.rs (happy path, auth failure, disconnect/reconnect). Verified via cargo test --features audio --test realtime_session_tests -- --nocapture.

payload.description: Track and close remaining core-loop parity gaps vs pi-mono discovered during roci alignment work. Scope excludes TUI.
payload.title: pi-agent core parity follow-ups (non-TUI)

payload.description:
Problem: openai:* models containing substring 'codex' are auto-routed to openai-codex, which can misroute custom/FT models.
Acceptance criteria:
1) Only explicit codex providers/aliases (openai-codex/openai_codex/codex) route to OpenAiCodex by default.
2) Any additional heuristic must be explicit, documented, and covered by tests for non-codex false positives.
3) Add/adjust selector tests for routing matrix and preserve existing passing cases.
payload.title: Harden model selector codex routing heuristic

payload.description:
Design task for message extensibility in core loop.
Acceptance criteria:
1) Propose API for agent-side message abstraction and conversion into provider ModelMessage set before sanitize/provider call.
2) Define compatibility strategy with existing transform_context and tool result persistence hooks.
3) Document migration plan with minimal breakage and test strategy (unit + runner-level).
4) Capture performance and safety constraints (no role leakage to providers).
payload.title: Design extensible message conversion path (convert_to_llm parity)

payload.description:
Implement approved conversion design from prior task.
Acceptance criteria:
1) Introduce conversion hook/path in runtime/runner that supports filtering/transforming non-LLM messages before provider request.
2) Preserve current behavior when hook is unset.
3) Add tests for conversion correctness, skipped messages, and tool-call loop stability.
4) Update docs/examples for new hook usage.
payload.title: Implement message conversion integration in runner/runtime

payload.description:
Add controlled runtime mutators for parity with pi-agent ergonomic APIs.
Acceptance criteria:
1) Add safe setters/replacers for system prompt, tools, and conversation messages (and model if supported) with state guards.
2) Define behavior while running (reject vs queue) and test it.
3) Ensure snapshot/state watchers reflect updates deterministically.
4) Document API contract and thread-safety semantics.
payload.title: Add AgentRuntime mutability APIs (model/system prompt/tools/messages)

payload.description:
Add queue controls without full reset.
Acceptance criteria:
1) Add APIs: clear_steering_queue, clear_follow_up_queue, clear_all_queues, has_queued_messages.
2) Preserve existing drain-mode semantics (All/OneAtATime).
3) Add unit tests for queue state transitions and interactions with continue_without_input.
4) Ensure reset behavior remains backward-compatible.
payload.title: Add fine-grained queue management APIs (steering/follow-up)

payload.description:
Transport is now plumbed into ProviderRequest but mostly unused by providers.
Acceptance criteria:
1) Define transport contract (allowed values and behavior) at provider boundary.
2) Implement at least one meaningful transport branch (e.g., direct vs proxy/custom backend) or explicitly reject unsupported values with clear error.
3) Add provider + runner tests proving transport alters behavior when configured.
4) Update docs/config examples.
payload.title: Make transport preference effective in provider execution path
